fields.name: image
fields.label: Image to Color
fields.description: Upload an image that users will color. If now image is provided, a blank canvas will be used.

fields.name: maxWidth
fields.label: Maximum Image Width
fields.description: Set the maximum width for the coloring image in pixels. The image will be scaled down to fit if it's larger.

fields.name: maxHeight
fields.label: Maximum Image Height
fields.description: Set the maximum height for the coloring image in pixels. The image will be scaled down to fit if it's larger.

fields.name: brushSize
fields.label: Default Brush Size
fields.description: Size of the brush in pixels

fields.name: enableEraser
fields.label: Enable Eraser Tool
fields.description: Allow users to erase their coloring

fields.name: enableFill
fields.label: Enable Fill Tool
fields.description: Allow users to fill areas with color

fields.name: enableTextTool
fields.label: Enable Text Tool
fields.description: Allow users to add text to the image

fields.name: instructions
fields.label: Instructions
fields.default: Color the image using the tools below. Click and drag to draw, or use the fill tool to color larger areas.
